com.c77.androidstreamingclient.lib.video

Class BufferedSample

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.c77.androidstreamingclient.lib.video.BufferedSample

  • public class BufferedSample
extends java.lang.Object
    Buffer wrapper that keeps timestamp and index of the RTP buffer.
    Author:
    Julian Cerruti

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      BufferedSample(java.nio.ByteBuffer buffer, int index)
      Constructs a buffered sample given a buffer and an index.
